Description:
Primary Duties and Responsibilities:Deliver process engineering services that meet clients its customers' and applicable statutory and regulatory specifications, on time and within budget.
Initiate, manage and if required supervise process engineering project requirements.
Keep up-to-date with the latest developments and technical innovations in process engineering.
If required, assist and support junior personnel within the process engineering team.
Communicate effectively with the process engineering team and project stakeholders, including the Customer.
Identify issues and problems, develop appropriate solutions, and ask for assistance when required.Skills
Skills:
Qualification: FEED and detailed engineering experience is essential.
Minimum 10 years of experience in Process engineering in offshore brownfield projects. Proficient in process simulation packages such as HYSYS, Flarenet, PipeSys
